website_summaries.verdict: Attractive bar-height seating and square table that has plenty of curb appeal with a relatively small footprint. Inviting design, especially with the seat cushions.
pros: Chairs are easy to mount and dismount
Pretty tempered glass table with a bit of storage beneath
Classy bistro set for a smaller space
cons: The chairs aren’t as deep as some would like

customer_reviews.title: Great! Until it weathered 6 weeks of occasional rains
customer_reviews.text: We are using chairs table on a balcony overlooking a fabulous view of the Harbour in Sea Pines on Hilton Head Island, SC. We rarely sat outside before this table and the chairs we bought separately, but from the same manufacturer. Now we are outside quite often. Love the set and the sturdiness. Thanks!! 6 weeks later, I’m less enthusiastic. The table and chairs are leaking rusty water.
customer_reviews.author: JBPIS

customer_reviews.title: Very 😀 Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this outdoor set. It’s very sturdy and better quality than I expected. The cushions are nice and a common size so they can be replaced if needed. Delivery was quick, came in two separate boxes, one for table and two chairs in the other. Assembly was pretty simple and the directions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Super Good Table
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied whit this table .i received the table was not damaged ,and the parts of each part were not lost .it took about 30 minutes to assemble. The table after assembly is very strong and stable, and the glass on the surface of the table is beautiful and clean.This table looks cute, and the height of 36 inches goes well with my chair. It is also very suitable from the appearance. In addition, unlike other tables, it has storage space! I will put some books or snacks to spend my leisure time. I really like this table, the quality is good and affordable. I think you will like it too! Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ivyowen

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are an excellent value for the price. Well constructed, easy to assemble and good looking. I also want to say the Top Sales Company has been a Good company to work with when we had 2 shipments held up in transit due to the corona virus. They refunded our money in both cases even though the products were sitting in the shippers warehouse or trailers. The next time I need patio furniture this will be the first place I come.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Chairs look great, very easy to assemble... strongly recommend not using tools supplied... much easier with your own tools. Unfortunately the hardware pack came dislodged from the container in the box and broke open. nuts, bolts, washers spread all through the box. Shipping handling created a small tear in the box and I am missing abouit 15 pieces of assembly hardware. Contacted customer support several days ago as instructed in their manual... not a single response yet... thus the reduced rating. Once parts are received I will; gladly redo my rating... At this time only one chair assembled
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Decent Patio Set - Some Ups, Some Downs
customer_reviews.text: Overall - decent patio set. The quality is decent and the overall appearance is as expected. The chairs are not very deep and therefore leave a lot of your legs hanging off of the edge and relying on the foot support at the bottom of the chairs. The table is basic but the shelf at the bottom is nice for storage or additional foot support. The first order that was shipped to me only came with the chairs and no table. I tried to request that only the table be resent but the entire set was shipped. Now I have another set of chairs that need to be returned 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Table is physically sturdy (top scratches easily though) and has been a good addition to my small porch. Definitely needed two people to assemble. You'll also probably want folding hex-key (L wrench) set to make assembly easier. The instructions were mislabeled and out of order. The instructions on the page would not match the diagrams (i.e. instead matching the next pages diagrams) and the instruction book mislabeled the screws and washers. The table top is glass and the black scratched pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: rkm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Well made
customer_reviews.text: EDIT Now that we’ve been using them — they are super comfortable!! You will not be disappointed. These are really nice!! Super sturdy and very comfortable. They were actually pretty easy to assemble. I did give it only a 3 star for assembly- the tools they provide just aren’t strong enough to put this together in any sort of timely fashion. Also, the directions were off in step one. Other than that I was able to assemble 2 chairs by myself in about 45 minutes (with stronger tools). Definitely looking forward to relaxing in these!!
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembling these will require time and physical strength. These come completely disassembled, including the handles. Putting together two chairs you will need to tighten some 64 bolts, which don't go in easily and require creative maneuvers to tighten. Although it can be put together by one person, having a second adult helps for attaching the ring. So far my chairs do not rotate. I'll try oiling the rotation mechanism. The quality of metal is so so... I wouldn't recommend it for people over 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’ve waited a couple months to use this I can truly say this outdoor set is great. It was exactly what I wanted. Counter height with zero squeaking, wobbling or scratches on the black glass top table. Took a couple hours to put together by myself but the instructions were clear and included all the tools needed so it was not super difficult. It comes in two separate, heavy boxes that I was able to drag in my front door. Also, Customer service was very quick to respond when I reached out about the second box arriving a day later.
customer_reviews.author: maddieblossom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bar Height Patio Set.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my husband and I were looking for. I took a little bit of time to put together but my husband was able to do. The one thing that bugs me a little is I slide forward a little and I have to keep scooting back in the seat. My husband looked at the directions again and he said that was the only way to put the seat together. I feel if the bottom of the seat could lead back a little that would solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores A. Sabers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but difficulty assembly process
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few hours to put everything together. Once I got to the second chair, things went faster. When attaching the bottom of the chair to the base, I found it difficult to get all four screws in for my second chair. I also had some difficulty attaching the arms b/c the screws didn't want to go all the way in. One kept popping out. I did a good job, considering I'm not the most experienced at putting things together but it definitely takes much effort to assemble. Also, the boning of the chair digs into the back of my thighs when getting up my, which is uncomfortable. Table was easier to assemble, but it is wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Brown girl

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn
customer_reviews.text: After it's put together it's nice. But as a single mom with no one to help me it really sucked grappling with this set to put it together. I am extremely handy, more so than most. Directions did not match the labeled screw set that came with it so that took some mulling over before beginning. I'm just thankful it's done and up. Would buy again if I had to but....just be prepared to have two ppl just in case. I'm Stubborn so....touché
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased! Chairs NEXT!
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged very well! No parts were missing and it took about 20 minutes to put together. It is pretty heavy but well made. I think I will end up purchasing the chairs that go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Shanni

customer_reviews.title: That all pieces as stated when purchased where not in the box...
customer_reviews.text: After waiting a month or more to receive this item before opening I only see stated on the box two chairs... I have wrote the seller and will update as to what their response was..After paying a nice amount for this set I don’t want just chairs and having to purchase a table would totally be acceptable at all... Very disappointed customer...
customer_reviews.author: Marvella Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Would easily seat 4 for drinks! Love it. Easy to assemble. Looks great on our deck. Good price. Got quickly. Love the dark glass on top!
customer_reviews.author: Evava

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I assemble the chars during the weekend. They are pretty straightforward and took me not long to finish the work. The caution are comfortable and the chairs are stable. Very solid product. I put them in my second living room. They are perfect fit. I like these chairs
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This set is remarkable, easy to construct, looks beautiful and I am so happy with it. FYI full disclosure, I am an older woman and managed to put this together and move it upstairs in an afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Jan GLL

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy, but not at all comfortable. I'm 5 foot and feel like I'm sitting on edge of seat. My husband is 6'4 and he might as well stand up rather than try to sit in the chair, he can't. If I had not already assembled both chairs, I would have sent it back. It sits unused in the corner of my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price.. take time assembling
customer_reviews.text: Love my set.. covid project by all means.. if u are not used to assembling have help.. can be overwhelming.. cushions are nice to look at but no comfort .. flatten even when small child sits .. we had to prop up so not to hurt our backs(& we are fit ppl)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fontes

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: First chair took awhile, table was easy, 2nd chair however, I finally figured out the swivel, part E was mounted on the wrong side of chair base. I will have to unassemble, etc. Other than assembly, the table and one chair is nice. Wish it didn't cause so much frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Seller:  "You need to purchase a new table!"
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the table with two chairs. They were very nice in every respect. However, a strong wind blew the tempered glass top of the table out and it shattered into thousands of pieces. I contacted the seller to purchase a replacement glass and was told that they didn't sell any and that I needed to purchase a new table.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful table
customer_reviews.text: My original back yard table was destroyed by fallen tree last winter, but four chairs condition were very good. I was going to buy a table to match chairs. I look for the table at internet and found the table, I am so happy to get it, it’s so nice to match my original four chairs, it’s easy to assemble and the price is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Man S.

customer_reviews.title: set delivered  only was the chairs table missing
customer_reviews.text: unable to ck with ups as to missing box containing table - hope replacemt set arrives complete
customer_reviews.author: Frederick R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is fair. The chairs are heavy and sturdy. I didn’t rate this product higher because the swivel is not as smooth as it should be and the stool is very wide.
customer_reviews.author: A moon

customer_reviews.title: Cushions are cheap and worthless
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are fine, they are sturdy and swivel nicely. But.....the cushions are only 1" thick and are so uncomfortable. You can feel the bottom of the chair after sitting on them once! I guess that is why they are free!! They are an odd size, so getting replacements are impossible. There should be an upgrade available, at least in thickness. We would like to buy another pair but the cushions are a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are not comfortable. Everyone that sits in them slides down slowly into an uncomfortable position. I bought them for my grandmother and she cannot sit in them.
customer_reviews.author: Brett N.

customer_reviews.title: Watch your height
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are comfortable, but we put them together and noticed they're not truly bar height. This site doesn't show those dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushions fade really quick.
customer_reviews.text: Love the furniture, but the cushions have faded really bad and only have had these a few months...it is not fade resistant..
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set.
customer_reviews.text: For the money it really is a nice set. One of the cushions was missing a button but otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the patio and very well made. I got mine for half price, at around $70, so at that price, a bargain
customer_reviews.author: T. Overstake

customer_reviews.title: incomplete no help
customer_reviews.text: ordered the table and chair set, NO TABLE DELIVERED. Can't get answers other than "use the same tracking number as chair box" which we all know is inaccurate. Chairs are comfortable and easy to assemble but without a table.... Guess I need to contact credit card company.
customer_reviews.author: B Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is outstanding. the stools spin sooothly, chairs are very comfortable. It is very easy to assemble.I like this set
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together! Paired it with barstools we already had
customer_reviews.author: Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the deck.
customer_reviews.text: The chair are very sturdy and comfortable. They take awhile to put together, but the assembly instructions are very clear and easy to follow. Great chairs for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNE G GROVES

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass this up!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a bar height table, this is the one! Very Sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: T Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value...poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Package was delivered without the table. Chairs are great. Took substantial effort to get the table delivered after 12 days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, do not sit well, kisses need to be thicker and longer.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed in the cushions after sitting on them, they become uncomfortable, they’re not thick enough!
customer_reviews.author: janice m. mullins

customer_reviews.title: Patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs, no trouble assembling. Great addition to my patio set. Perfect bar table height.
customer_reviews.author: konb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Using the Allen Wrench that is sent with the furniture is hard to use due to it's small suz
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking chairs. Hard to assemble and the cushions are not comfortable. Assembly is just a little time consuming which is ok. However you will need to purchase new cushions if you want them to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together but once they are, very sturdy and comfortable. They look great too!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Patio table
customer_reviews.text: I’m am disappointed to have spent so much money and the product came damaged. I have tried contacting the number that was in the box but I haven’t received any answers! I love chairs and the table but the top frame of the table was scuffed up and there’s a dent on the one side. I wish I could just get the frame replaced.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT bar height
customer_reviews.text: These are COUNTER height chairs. Bar height starts at 29". These are 26" at the highest point of the cushion which squishes down when you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: heather bonewitz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks nice, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Problem with delivery but it was easily resolved by Amazon. Overall very happy with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Bad swivels
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair. Everything is very nice and strong, except the swivels! The ball bearings are falling out. I have contacted amazon about this, we will see what they do
customer_reviews.author: Lance B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy my husband put them together ad had fun
customer_reviews.text: For the cost these are bigger than we thought and I would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the money. Cannot go wrong with this patio set. Nice cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Rusting within 10 months!
customer_reviews.text: I am generally happy with the table and chairs, however, after 10 months it is rusting in various places - see the pictures. The description said it had a rust protective coating yet that does not seem to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Stills

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about this set. Perfect height, and sturdy enough for larger sized people. My husband and I are not small people and this set feels very comfortable and sturdy. Also, it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: hope you like waiting
customer_reviews.text: chairs took over 3 weeks to get here and many calls to amazon and locates. neither company knew where the chairs were or why taking so long. chairs are nice just be prepared to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Giefer

customer_reviews.title: Table Missing from Order
customer_reviews.text: I only got the chairs there was no table. Please contact me. I need the table immediately. LW
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Thicker bottom cushions...
customer_reviews.text: I think the cushions could be a bit thicker.....otherwise, it is pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Boydstun

customer_reviews.title: Rust leaking from chairs
customer_reviews.text: Chairs leaking rust all over. Ruined my deck floor. I noticed another customer had the same complaint. Tried contacting company without any success. Just get a recording that won’t let me leave a message. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: The table are a little heavy but it is very sturdy.Glass top is very easy to clean up.It is quite a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: guoqi zheng

customer_reviews.title: A very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Its quality is very good. It's easy to install,The price is reasonable and very practical, It's a great gift for my family!
customer_reviews.author: White Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: The table came on time in a sturdy box. There were not instructions included but my daughter was able to put it together easily. It is the perfect height ( counter height), sturdy and attractive. Now I am waiting on the chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Table is scratched and button missing from cushion I would like to have company respon
customer_reviews.author: CHERIE DELEYSER

customer_reviews.title: RUST and more RUST
customer_reviews.text: We assembled this product less than a month ago and it has rust all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis D Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after first rain
customer_reviews.text: Rusted after the first rain fell on it. My desk has orange stains on it due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble, sits comfortably but not too high.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Table delivered without chairs
customer_reviews.text: Only received the table and I ordered the table with two chairs. Where are the chairs?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Use It Every Day During Crisis
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together except for one chair that didn't have the holes in the seat to attach to the back. Had to go find someone drill holes
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I normally won’t buy anything I have to assemble but took the chance buying this. I was definitely easy to assemble. .
customer_reviews.author: Lola Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and very nice! Best for garden supply.
customer_reviews.author: wang xiaoyue

customer_reviews.title: Problem with cushions
customer_reviews.text: The buttons on the back cushions are popping off. Need to use a stronger string.
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY KADETS

customer_reviews.title: Great Table For The Price
customer_reviews.text: and great for a small space or just 2 people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered without the table.  Bad deal.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered without the table. Seems like a pretty big downside. I wouldn’t order this if they only give you 2 chairs without the table.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Metz

customer_reviews.title: No arms for chairs
customer_reviews.text: Chairs came without arms. Set is completely assembled I just need arms but no customer service at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to assemble. Cushions are easy to clean off and chair is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: amanda brundage

product_meta.title: LOKATSE HOME Patio Bar Height Set with 2 Outdoor Swivel Chairs and 1 High Glass Top Table, 3 Piece Bistro, Beige Cushion
product_meta.description: Color:Beige CushionAdd Fun to Your Outdoor Experience When you are outdoors with friends or with your family. You always want to have such comfortable and stylish outdoor furniture. Our LOKATSE HOME store will create a high quality, stylish and comfortable home brand. It can be used in many occasions and can add decoration to your backyard, pool and more. This 3 piece bistro bar set height swivel is built high quality steel frame with powder-coated and tempered glass that has long-term durability. Our outdoor furniture is durable and sturdy and can be used for many years. Features : Tempered glass for table top and high temperature tolerant. The design of two tiers offers versatile space for storage and display. This bar table is double rear leg connector, more secure and steady. Specifications : 1. Weight Capacity: 53. 2 Pounds (stool); 27. 9 Pounds (table)2. Swivel Bar Stool: 22. 6'' L x 26. 4'' W x 42. 7'' H3. Glass Top Patio Table: 27. 6'' L x 27. 6'' W x 36. 2''HPackage Include : 2 x patio bar height chairs1 x square bistro tempered glass top table(You will receive two packages and two tracking numbers)Notice: 1. Be careful to take care of small parts. 2. This bistro bar set needs assembly. (tools and instructions provided)3. Seat cushion and back cushion for each chair(FREE)
feature_bullets: Durable material - the outdoor swivel Bar stools has a durable rust-resistant powder-coated Steel frame, The comfortable waterproof cushions, makes it an ideal choice for outdoor living spaces, and the Bistro Table is powder-coated, and has a high-quality steel frame, Tempered Glass. The 3-Piece swivel set offers long-term durability.

Special designed - The 360-degree rotation is a special design for this courtyard rotating Bar Stool, for easy Rotation in any direction and allows you to maximize the enjoyment of this bar. Simply swivel to talk with others from various directions or see things from different perspectives. 360° swivel function provides extra comfort and relaxation.

Stable structure - the design of rear legs The outdoor Bar glass Table steady preventing it leaning or Inclining. Double rear-leg-connector design makes the patio tempered glass top Table more secure and steady, and bearing capacity is stronger.

PRODUCT DIMENSION - Swivel Bar Stool: 22. 6''(L)x26. 4''(W)x42. 7''(H); Glass Top Table: 27. 6''(L)x27. 6''(W)x36. 2''(H). This 3 pcs tall bistro bar set has two packages. One parcel is a glass patio table and the other parcel is two bar stools.

CUSTOMER SERVICE - Our store offering free replacement or refund in 30 days: damage and missing parts. If there is any quality problem, please contact us freely. We try our best to provide the best service for you in our store. Instructions can be downloaded from the page under the "Product information".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars61 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
